SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.controllers.gsonCtrl

Class SimulationSaverGSON

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.controllers.gsonCtrl.SimulationSaverGSON
public class SimulationSaverGSON extends Object
Handles saving and loading of the simulation state using GSON.

Uses Gson for serialization and deserialization of SimulationState. Registers custom adapters for components like CompColor, MassComponent, and Point2DExt.

  • Method Details

    • setCurrentState

      public void setCurrentState(SimulationState currentState)
      Sets the current simulation state to be saved.
      Parameters:
      currentState - the SimulationState to be set.

    • saveSimStateGSON

      public void saveSimStateGSON(String dirPath)
      Saves the current simulation state to a JSON file in the specified directory.

      Uses GsonBuilder to create a GSON instance with pretty printing and custom adapters. Generates a unique filename based on the current timestamp.

      Parameters:
      dirPath - the directory path where the JSON file will be saved.

    • loadSimStateGSON

      public SimulationState loadSimStateGSON(String dirPath)
      Loads the most recent simulation state from a JSON file in the specified directory.

      Uses GsonBuilder to create a GSON instance with custom adapters. Searches for the latest JSON file in the directory and deserializes it into a SimulationState. Recreates the entities for each Mover in the loaded state.

      Parameters:
      dirPath - the directory path from where the JSON file will be loaded.
      Returns:
      the loaded SimulationState, or null if an error occurs.
